headline: BlackRock CEO Larry Fink is the latest executive to have his pay package targeted by proxy advisor ISS
summary: Fink’s compensation jumped 33% from $26.9 million to $36.7 million after a banner year in 2024.

raw.headline: BlackRock CEO Larry Fink is the latest executive to have his pay package targeted by proxy advisor ISS

headline: Bitcoin May Evolve Into Low-Beta Equity Play Reflexively, BlackRock's Mitchnik Says
summary: "It makes no fundamental sense, and yet when it's repeated enough, it can actually become a little self-fulfilling,” Mitchnik said.

raw.headline: Bitcoin May Evolve Into Low-Beta Equity Play Reflexively, BlackRock's Mitchnik Says
raw.summary: "It makes no fundamental sense, and yet when it's repeated enough, it can actually become a little self-fulfilling,” Mitchnik said.

headline: BlackRock Looking to Tokenize Shares of Its $150B Treasury Trust Fund, SEC Filing Shows
summary: BlackRock will work with BNY Mellon in creating a new class of Distributed Ledger Technology shares for the fund.

raw.headline: BlackRock Looking to Tokenize Shares of Its $150B Treasury Trust Fund, SEC Filing Shows
raw.summary: BlackRock will work with BNY Mellon in creating a new class of Distributed Ledger Technology shares for the fund.

headline: 3 Names I Picked Up In The Latest Market Slump
summary: When the market is reaching toward all-time highs, I tend to start building a cash pile. Check out three stocks that I added to during this market decline.
